        Parameters:

      • getParsedDNASequences

        public static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,org.biojava3.core.sequence.DNASequence> getParsedDNASequences(java.io.File refSeq)
                                                                                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Parses a multi-fasta file into a LinkedHashMap of sequence names and DNASequences
        Parameters:
        refSeq - a multi-fasta file of DNA sequences
        Returns:
        a LinkedHashMap of Accession numbers as keys with their DNA sequences as values. All sequence names will have any non-accession information stripped (e.g. ">gi|2033910|gb|AA381581.1|AA381581 EST94688 Activated T-cells I Homo sapiens" would become ">gi|2033910|gb|AA381581.1|AA381581")
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:

        Returns:
